title: EmployerEstablishmentType
description: Information to identify and reference a specific establishment within an organization.

taxIdentifiers.description: A government assigned identifier to distinguish the establishment. This may be assigned by a country, state, province, etc.

industryIdentifiers.description: The types of industry to which the establishment belongs. The Industry identifiers could be referenced to a standard taxonomy (such as NAICS) or a custom taxonomy.

businessFunction.description: Describe the business functions performed at the location, e.g., administrative, warehouse, retail, professional services, information technology, engineering, R&D, etc.

establishmentActivity.description: A description of the business activities conducted at the establishment, listed by approximate percentage of revenue or sales associated with each activity.

tradeName.description: Trade name of the establishment or doing-business-as (DBA).

statusHistory.description: Specifies the current status of the establishment, e.g. sold, temporarily closed, permanently closed, merged, acquired, etc.
